Obsidian Media Notes Plugin

Instructions for setting up the bookmarklet workflow:

  1. Drag this bookmarklet link (Media Note v1.2) to your browser bookmark bar
  2. Open up a YouTube video
  3. Click on the new bookmarklet (allow it to call Obsidian)
Now you can click this bookmarklet while on any YouTube video
to create a media note in Obsidian.

I hope this plugin provides you value in your learning.
If you'd like to support the work, I gratefully accept donations here.
If you're interested, you can learn more about why I created this tool.
